gashas.name: Hercule's Fortune Summon
gashas.description:
{center:begin}Perform Summons with {color : #FFFF00}Hercule's Fortune Summon Tickets{color}
to get {color : #FF9900}Hercule Statues{color}!{center}

courses.title: {color: #FFFF00}Hercule's Fortune Summon{color}
courses.description:
Use {color : #FFFF00}1 Hercule's Fortune Summon Ticket{color}
to perform {color : #FF9900}a Single Summon{color}!

courses.title: {color: #FFFF00}Hercule's Fortune Summon{color}
courses.description:
Use {color : #FFFF00 }5 Hercule’s Fortune Summon Tickets{color} to perform {color : #FF9900 }a Multi-Summon{color}!
Get {color : #FF9900 }5 Hercule Statues per Multi-Summon{color}!

gashas.name: Power UP! SSR Force Summon
gashas.description:
{center:begin}Power UP! SSR Force Summon is on!
Use "{color: #FFFF00}SSR Force Summon Tickets{color}" to perform summons!{center}

courses.title: {color: #FFFF00}Power UP! SSR Force Summon{color}
courses.description: Guaranteed to get an SSR character.

courses.title: {color: #FFFF00}Power UP! SSR Force Summon{color}
courses.description: Guaranteed to get an SSR character.

gashas.name: Friend Summon

courses.title: {color: #FFFF00}Friend Summon{color}
courses.description: Use Friend Points to obtain a character!

courses.title: {color: #FFFF00}Friend Summon{color}
courses.description:
One {color : #FFFF00}Hercule Statue{color} or {color : #FFFF00}Z-Awakened character{color} guaranteed!
Get 10 characters with this Summon.

gashas.name: Family Kamehameha Summon
gashas.description:
{center:begin}"{color: #FFCC00}Family{color} {color: #66CCFF}Kamehameha{color} {color : #FFFF00}Summon{color}" is now on!
Certain characters can be {color: #4B76F2}Extreme Z-Awakened{color}!{center}

courses.title: {color: #FFCC00}Family Kamehameha{color} {color: #FFFF99}Summon{color}
courses.description: Get a Rare or higher character with this Summon.

courses.title: {color: #FFCC00}Family Kamehameha{color} {color: #FFFF99}Summon{color}

gashas.name: "Mysterious Ritual" Summon
gashas.description:
{center:begin}{color : #FFFF00}4 times only!{color} "Mysterious Ritual" Summon!
Use {color : #FFFF00}25 Dragon Stones{color} to get {color : #FFFF00}5 Elder Kai{color}!{center}

courses.title: {color : #FFFF00}"Mysterious Ritual" Summon{color}
courses.description:
{color : #FFFF00}4 times only!{color} "Mysterious Ritual" Summon!
Perform a Multi-Summon to get {color : #FFFF00}5 Elder Kai{color}!
* The available character in this Summon Event is {color : #FFFF00}Elder Kai{color} only.

courses.title: {color : #FFFF00}"Mysterious Ritual" Summon{color}
courses.description:
{color : #FFFF00}4 times only!{color} "Mysterious Ritual" Summon!
Perform a Multi-Summon to get {color : #FFFF00}5 Elder Kai{color}!
*The available character in this Summon Event is {color : #FFFF00}Elder Kai{color} only.

gashas.name: Dokkan Festival [Gohan (Teen) & Goten (Kid)]
gashas.description:
{center:begin}Dokkan Festival! New {color: #00CC00}Gohan (Teen) & Goten (Kid){color} arrives!
One SSR character guaranteed per Multi-Summon!{center}
